reviews.name: Needs new reporting system
reviews.title: Needs new reporting system
reviews.text: I love Roblox, it‚Äôs filled with new friends and nice people. The games are fun and everyone is super nice! But there is just one problem. The reporting system is a bit under protected. I think there should be screen shots for proof, screen recording proof, etc. The reason I‚Äôm recommending this is because today when I logged onto Roblox it said that I had to agree to terms and conditions to start my account. I read what it said. It had said that Roblox was asking me this because Roblox moderators determined that I was being ‚Äúracist‚Äù and ‚Äúhateful‚Äù I don‚Äôt know if it was because of my all lives matter group or because somebody falsely reported me because they were mad at me etc. All I‚Äôm saying is that Roblox should get a proof system or something close to that. I have gotten falsely reported so many times because people have gotten mad at me or I have gotten mad at them. I love Roblox but honestly you guys probably need this.
